title: What is Google Workspace? | Google Workspace
text: What is Google Workspace? Google Workspace is a productivity solution designed to help you safely connect, create, and collaborate with tools like Gmail, Docs, Meet, and more. Get business-grade features with a Google Workspace business account Business plans include a professional email address, enhanced productivity and collaboration tools, and Gemini for Google Workspace â all to help your business grow. Custom professional email This feature is available on Google Workspace and Google Workspace plans.Give your business credibility by getting a custom you@yourbusiness.com email address. Premium Meet and Calendar features This feature is available on select Google Workspace and Google Workspace plans.Host longer , record and transcribe video meetings, and get enhanced appointment schedule capabilities.Extra storage and security This feature is available on Google Workspace and Google Workspace plans.Get up to 5TB storage with advanced and compliance controls to help keep your customer data safe.Get an AI-powered assistant in Gmail, Docs & more This feature is available on Google Workspace and Google Workspace plans.Google Workspace with Gemini helps you do your best work faster with an AI-powered assistant built into , , , and more.Choose the plan that's right for you *Google Workspace provides flexible pooled storage per user that is shared across the organization. Visit our Help Center to learn more about getting additional storage for your organization. Frequently asked questions - Integrated, easy-to-use applications designed to enhance productivity - Create, edit, and share documents, spreadsheets, and presentations - Secure, flexible storage in the cloud with Drive - Administrative functionality for managing user permissions and access - Optional customized business email domains to enhance trust and visibility of your organization - Communications features including Chat and video conferencing via Meet - Manage your time and offer your availability for clients to book in Calendar - And more Google Workspace combines popular business solutions such as secure file sharing, video conferencing, and more in one place for easier management and simplified costs. On top of a suite of thoughtfully-connected tools, Google Workspace offers enterprise-grade security in the cloud, as well as flexible storage and pricing for businesses of all sizes. Google Workspace gives you the option to get a with your businessâs domain name.Businesses who want to be more efficient, productive, and collaborative can benefit from Google Workspaceâs robust suite of interconnected apps. Google Workspace offers flexible pricing options for businesses, ranging from start-ups to enterprise-level organizations. Easily scale up as your business grows to get even more custom features designed to support your team. Connect, create, and collaborate with Google Workspace for your business. Ready to learn more?
